channel.title: BANING HOST Error
channel.description:
Hey Guys When I Try To Login My Server It Says On The "Run.Bat" CODE OF ERROR.. [code]Loaded Worldmap in (190 ms)... Your Server Is Now Online! Connection from comp2010:49750 [client-1-Perses]: Failed to load player: Perses clientHandler: Client null discinnected (comp2010) connection from comp2010:49751 [client-1-Perses]: Failed to load player: Perses clientHandler: Client null discinnected (comp2010) BANNING HOST comp2010 (flooding) ClientHandler: Rejected comp2010:49752 ClientHandler: Rejected comp2010:49753 ClientHandler: Rejected comp2010:49754 ClientHandler: Rejected comp2010:49755[/code]
Please Help ME!

item.title: BANING HOST Error
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Go into server class and get rid of the method.

Read full topic

item.title: BANING HOST Error
item.dc:creator: @Burkey Burkey
item.description:
@Burkey wrote:

This will often happen if you close the server, then re-run it very fast, it recognizes that specific rejected player as flooding the server and it then proceeds to revoke his right to log in. Simply keep the server down for a good 10-15 seconds and try to inform your players not to spam the login button.

Read full topic
